attributes.action: STOP THE  GP CONSULTATION OF BABY'S BY PHONE
attributes.additional_details: Push the GP clinics to give consultation in person to baby's,don't let them hide behind a phone,you can see a infection symptom or others symptoms by phone when a parent is calling because baby have fever ,they just instruct you to give him calpol and ibuprofen without a minimum knowledge for what is going on.Stop doing experiments on our baby's base on immunity system,push them to give priority to a baby with fever do not allowed to go on convulsion and damage them brain becoming after autist
attributes.background: DOCTORS THEY ARE PREPARED TO SEE ALL SIGNS OF SICKNESS BUT THEY RELY IN WHAT PARENTS SAY BY PHONE,OUR BABY'S DON'T RECEIVE A GOOD ATTENTION AND MEDICATION,A DOCTOR WHEN IS CHECKING IN PERSON MAY SEE ALL SIGNS AND GIVE HIM EARLY AID .MOTHERS LOOK WITH EYES OF MUM THE SITUATION NOT A DOCTOR EYES

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
Decisions about how to offer GP services are a matter for individual practices, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Create a legal right for patients to receive timely face-to-face GP appointments: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
